alert.note: Alert for Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 11:36AM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow, sleet and freezing rain. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 4 inches and total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central, northwest and western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall totals will likely be above 2000 feet elevation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central Virginia Blue Ridge; Eastern Highland; Northern Virginia Blue Ridge
